name: Symphonic Warrior Drumss
text: Once per turn, you can declare 1 Attribute and select 1 face-up "Symphonic Warrior" monster on the field. That monster becomes that Attribute. You can declare 1 Attribute and remove from play this card from your Graveyard to select 1 face-up "Symphonic Warrior" monster you control, and make it that Attribute.
